import React from 'react' import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import { Formik , Form, Field, FieldArray, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; const SignUp = () => { const formInitialSchema = { name : '', email : '', password : '' } const formValidation = yup.object().shape({ name : yup.string().required('Name is required'), email : yup.string().required('Email is required').email('Please Enter Valid Email Address'), password : yup.string().required('Password is required') }); const handleFormSubmit = (values) => { console.log("submitted values", values) } return (

Hello, Friend!

Enter your personal details and start journey with us

Create Account

handleFormSubmit(values))}>

) } export default SignUp;
